p: The characterization and quantification of phenolic components of pomegranate peels and leaves, fig leaves, guava leaves and olive leaves crude juices was carried out using HPLC. Table 3 presents the phenolic components of juice of the botanical parts under study. Due to The lack of certain equipments, i.e., mass spectrometer, and some of authentic substances prevented the complete identification the components of botanical parts' crude juices.
